mapper.select: select m.perms from t_community_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN t_community_sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN t_community_sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select.if: select count(1) from t_community_sys_user as us where 1=1
and us.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ user_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR },'%')
